result.title: Appeal to The High Court of Byteland
result.content:
Dear High Court of Byteland,

I would like to sue Syloviaely for impersonating me, and I demand 1000 Codeforces rating points (which is to be removed from his account and added to mine). You see, my name is Sylap Aliyev and this Syloviaely guy is using anagram of my name and plus a few changes, and thus benefiting from my popularity in a way that is not allowed by the Byteland laws. Using my popularity, he has even risen to top-10 charts of Codeforces. I think I am being very generous by demanding only 1000 rating points. Please, everyone reading this email, acknowledge my magnanimity.

Thanks.

Sincerely,
The Real Sylap Aliyev
